Title: An Act Changing the Name of Barangay Veterans Village in the Municipality of Ipil, Province of Zamboanga Del Sur, into Barangay Luis C. Ruiz, Sr.
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 657
An Act Changing the Name of Barangay Veterans Village in the Municipality of Ipil, Province of Zamboanga Del Sur, into Barangay Luis C. Ruiz, Sr.
Section 1. The name of Barangay Veterans Village in the Municipality of Ipil, Province of Zamboanga del Sur, is changed into Barangay Luis C. Ruiz, Sr.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: March 7, 1984
